name: Young Emerald Dragon
movement: walk 40 ft., burrow 20 ft., fly 60 ft.
description: The Young Emerald Dragon is a large and imposing figure with strong features, proficient in both combat and cunning tactics. Its scales shimmer in shades of green, reflecting its affinity for nature and the environment.
memorable: Possesses powerful psionic abilities with long-range observation and devastating thunder-based attacks.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate its territory and manipulate others through cunning and deception.
relations: Often encountered alongside other dragons or powerful arcane creatures.
environment: Commonly found in lush forested areas or hidden underground lairs, blending seamlessly with nature.
strengths: High Armor Class and hit points, strong spellcasting abilities, and formidable melee attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks that are not psychic or thunder damage.
attacks: Multiattack with a powerful bite and claws, complemented by thunder damage on bite.
most_powerful_ability: Maddening Breath, a devastating area attack that deals significant thunder damage.
senses: Possesses keen senses with a passive perception score of 17, allowing it to stay alert.
skills: Excels in deception and stealth, allowing it to confuse and ambush unsuspecting foes.
additional_information: Resistant to psychic and thunder damage.
Innate spellcasting abilities allowing for tactical control of encounters.
Ability to psionically observe distant creatures or locations.
spellcasting: Innate spellcaster with access to Hideous Laughter and Suggestion, using Charisma as its spellcasting ability.
test_queries: large green dragon that casts spells
young dragon with thunder breath weapon
emerald dragon with high AC and HP
